TopicTitle: Is it possible to make 1000m+ asteroids or a small planet?

Articles.Content: How could it be done? What is the biggest asteroid I could make? There is one on the space port that is 500m. What program do I use to make a small planet or asteroid? Alot of questions, I know

the same method used to make the 500m one could make larger ones. Planets are more complicated and an asteroid that was walkable as much so, there are modders working on it now though, heck even the dev's are supporting their efforts

the same method used to make the 500m one could make larger ones. Planets are more complicated and an asteroid that was walkable as much so, there are modders working on it now though, heck even the dev's are supporting their efforts

Really cool What programs do I use to do this? Where can I learn?
Theres a bunch of information down in the modding section of the forums, you'd have to look there

Okay thanks alot!
